markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 12+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Stampede Medallion](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1080)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Eidolon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=386" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 190 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

When you invest this medallion for your eidolon, it changes shape to appear as a tiny bejeweled facsimile of the eidolon, magically attached just over your eidolon's heart. While your eidolon wears the medallion, they gain a +2 item bonus to [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) checks to [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38) or [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40).

<document level="2" id="action-869" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

</traits>

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The activation's DC is 34 and the damage is 12d6.

level="2"
right="Item 18"
pfs="Standard"
>

</title>

</traits>
